guide.title: Peer to Peer
guide.description: An introductory guide to syncing and interacting with Couchbase Lite between devices.

introduction.paragraph: Peer-to-peer replications are often used when the clients are disconnected from the centralized server, in this case Sync Gateway. In addition, it places lower demands on the network infrastructure and offers the potential for lower latency.
The following sections walk you through:

unordered-list.list-item: How to add the Listener as a dependency.
Different methods of discovering IP addresses of peers on the network.
